name: Aurelia
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If Aurelia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: Aurelia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +15+1d14 + 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage, or 13 (1d10 + 8) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.
actions.Leadership: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a d10 to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.
actions.Warleader's Helix (Recharge 5\u20136): Ranged Spell Attack: +17+1d14 + 10 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 54 (12d8) radiant damage, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature regains 27 (6d8) hit points.

options.Command Allies: Aurelia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. If a chosen creature can see or hear Aurelia, it can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack, with advantage on the attack roll.
options.Frighten Foes (Costs 3 Actions): Aurelia targets up to five creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a DC 25+1d14 + 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her until the end of her next turn. Any target within 5 feet of Aurelia has disadvantage on the saving throw.
